creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: According to our Great Leader’s most recent instructions: the best election is one without ballots. To assure the continuation of the Regime, “get rid of the ballots.” Желаю удачи!
title: September 24, 2020: NEW! ELECTORAL GUIDELINES
